name: vivy
description: My mission is to make everyone happy by singing.

scripts.deploy: dotenvx run -- pm2 deploy ecosystem.config.cjs production
scripts.deploy:dev: dotenvx run --env-file=.env.dev -- pm2 deploy ecosystem.config.cjs development
scripts.deploy-setup: dotenvx run -- pm2 deploy ecosystem.config.cjs production setup
scripts.deploy-setup:dev: dotenvx run --env-file=.env.dev -- pm2 deploy ecosystem.config.cjs development setup

author: Gavenda <gavenda@disroot.org>
